page.title: 09WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content:
WITH ONLY 20 LADIES FROM FRANSHAM AND THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES WE ARE A SMALL GROUP AND MEET EACH SECOND THURSDAY IN THE MONTH AT 7.15PM. AT EACH MEETING WE HAVE A SPEAKER FOLLOWED BY REFRESHMENTS. WE ALSO HOLD A WHIST DRIVE EVERY 3RD TUESDAY IN THE MONTH. MEALS ON WHEELS ARE EFFICIENTLY ORGANISED BY TWO OF THE LADIES.
IN THE SPRING WE HELD A FASHION SHOW IN THE VILLAGE HALL AND RAISED MONEY FOR THE ARTHRITIS AND RHEUMATISM COUNCIL, A COFFEE MORNING AND NEARLY NEW SALE IN AID OF CROSSROADS,AND A JUMBLE SALE FOR OUR OWN FUNDS. IN JUNE FRANSHAM WAS FEATURED ON VILLAGE VOICE A RADIO NORFOLK PROGRAMME. LATER IN THE YEAR WE ARE HOLDING A DAY SCHOOL WHEN WE HOPE TO LEARN TO MAKE FLOWERS.
